name: Curse of the Ancient Turtle
desc: Banish 1 Zombie monster from your hand or GY; send 1 Zombie monster from your Deck to the GY. When your Zombie monster is destroyed by battle: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Zombie monster with 2000 or less DEF from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Curse of the Ancient Turtle" once per turn.
